    Class and Description
    DeployableMonitor
    Monitor the deployment status of a Deployable.
    DeployableMonitorListener

    Type of Deployer.

    Class and Description
    DeployableMonitor
    Monitor the deployment status of a Deployable.
    Deployer
    API to manage all deployment aspects of Deployable: deploy, undeploy, start, stop and restart.
